/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting two parts of the city. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
